name: A Woman Of Entitlement Quiz | Something in the Title | 10 Questions

questions.text: In 'A Woman Called Golda', which actress starred in the title role?
questions.explanation:
Ingrid Bergman.

	In this 1982 Emmy Award-winning TV-movie, Bergman plays Golda Meir, the former Israeli leader.

questions.text: Stevie Wonder wrote the score -- and also won an Oscar for his song, 'I Just Called To Say I Love You' -- in this Gene Wilder film. What was it called?
questions.explanation:
'The Woman In Red'.

	This 1984 film was a remake of the French farce, 'Pardon Mon Affaire'.

questions.text: 'A Woman of Paris' was directed by this comedic giant. It was an attempt to make a serious film. Who was he?
questions.explanation:
Charlie Chaplin.

	Although a box office flop, it was considered quite sophisticated for its time. Chaplin had a cameo role as a railway porter in this 1923 film.

questions.text: Who was Andy Garcia's leading lady in the 1994 movie, 'When a Man Loves a Woman'?
questions.explanation:
Meg Ryan.

	It's the story of a wife and mother of two who is forced to deal with her alcoholism, as well as her husband's reaction to it.

questions.text: The 1966 film 'A Man and a Woman' was a romantic drama about a young widow and a widower who fall in love. What country gave us this popular love story?
questions.explanation:
France.

	The film was one of the sixties' most popular love stories. It went on to win the Oscar for Best Foreign Film, and starred Anouk Aimee and Jean-Louis Trintignant.

questions.text: Basil Rathbone and Nigel Bruce starred in this Sherlock Holmes outing about blackmail, hypnotism and murdered women. What was the movie called?
questions.explanation:
'The Woman in Green'.

	This 1945 film also starred Hillary Brooke and Henry Daniell as a formidable pair of foes for Holmes and Watson.

questions.text: The John Cassavetes film 'A Woman Under the Influence' starred Peter Falk and this actress, who was married to Cassavetes. Who is the actress?
questions.explanation:
Gena Rowlands.

	Gena starred in many of her husband's films, who was considered one of the founding fathers of the independent film genre.

questions.text: What actor and actress starred in the 1964 British film, 'Woman of Straw'?
questions.explanation:
Sean Connery and Gina Lollobrigida.

	This pair plot the 'perfect murder' in this suspenseful film.

questions.text: In the first film that paired Spencer Tracy and Katherine Hepburn, Tracy played a sports reporter and Hepburn played a world-famous political commentator. What was the title of the film?
questions.explanation:
'Woman of the Year'.

	George Stevens directed this 1942 movie which later was a hit Broadway musical.

questions.text: What was the name of the 1981 film in which Francois Truffaut directed Gerard Depardieu and Fanny Ardent?
questions.explanation:
'The Woman Next Door'.

	This film was about two neighbors who revived an old relationship, although they were both married.
